messages.title: THIS THURSDAY, OUR NHS NEEDS YOU.
messages.content: WE HAVE 48 HOURS TO SAVE OUR NHS

messages.title: LABOUR WILL:
messages.content: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs Guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours Guarantee cancer tests and results within one week

messages.title: THE TORIES ARE A THREAT TO OUR NHS:
messages.content: Worst A&E crisis on record Extreme cuts which threaten the survival of our NHS Waiting lists at their highest levels for six years

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour plans to recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours, and ensure cancer tests and results are provided within one week.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Staying at home or voting for any other party will let the Tories win.

issues.health: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, Guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours, Guarantee cancer tests and results within one week. The Tories are a threat with the worst A&E crisis on record, extreme cuts threatening the NHS survival, and the highest waiting lists for six years.
